thread.title: a safe choice, nothing would go bad in this hotel.
thread.title_full: a safe choice, nothing would go bad in this hotel. - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JP P
title: a safe choice, nothing would go bad in this hotel.
text:
I stayed here first time in 2007, a few more times for the past several years. Then, recently I stayed here again during my trip to NY.
A nice location, a decent view from the room and the breakfast bar, and very nice staff. Plus, many Europeans (mostly French) stay here, thus quieter.
It is not super quaint or trendy; yet, their service is pretty solid all the time. New York itself can be very unpredictable and/thus stressful, so staying at a place which offers consistent service is a good thing after all.
